article_title: Student Accepted at West Point - Story
article_text:
A local high school senior is receiving special recognition upon his acceptance at the west point military academy. Jack Heaton, a senior at Notre Dame High School in Utica , received a surprise phone call while in class on Wednesday. Representativ e Richard Hanna, phoned Heaton to inform him of his acceptance into the prestigious United States Militar y Academy.



Heaton was blown away by the honor.



" It was great, it was probably the best news I have received in my life. Yesterday was just great for me. I was ecstatic when i heard it, and i was on cloud nine the entire day."



Heaton says he plans on becoming an infantry officer, while majoring in aerospace engineering.

article_metadata.description: A Notre Dame High School Senior was given a special message Wednesday by a local congressman of his acceptance into the United States Military Academy.
article_metadata.author: Mary Wilson
